title: Support Resources
description: Quick links and resources for opening support tickets, feedback, and contacting the maintainers.

pages.content:
Official support and feedback links:
- Open a support ticket (Discord): https://dis.gd/support
- Submit product feedback: https://dis.gd/feedback
- Discord API docs (contribute/corrections): https://github.com/discord/discord-api-docs
- Email the application maintainers: thediscordtimes@gmail.com

Vanity / redirect ideas (example): https://dis.gd/your-support-vanity (set up server/invite redirect to ticketing)

If none of those help, please include a short description of the problem and any relevant screenshots or logs when you file a ticket.
